title: Gower Romantic Escape
suitableFor: Couples seeking a relaxed coastal getaway with gentle walks, beautiful scenery, and optional watersports. Those who enjoy a mix of outdoor activity and comfortable accommodation.
notSuitableFor: Those seeking extreme adventure activities, a lively nightlife scene, or those with mobility issues due to some uneven terrain.

stops.title: Worm's Head Walk
stops.description: Explore the iconic Worm's Head at Rhossili Bay during low tide. Enjoy breathtaking views and spot seabirds.

wetAlt.title: Gower Heritage Centre

budgetAlt.title: Rhossili Headland Walk

knowBeforeYouGo.weather: Gower weather can be unpredictable, even in summer. Pack layers and be prepared for rain. Check the tide times for Worm's Head walk.
knowBeforeYouGo.traffic: Traffic can be heavy on weekends and during school holidays, especially around Rhossili and Oxwich. Arrive early to secure parking, particularly at Rhossili.
knowBeforeYouGo.booking: Book surfing lessons and accommodation in advance, especially during peak season. Worm's Head walk is tide-dependent and needs planning.
knowBeforeYouGo.fitness: This itinerary requires a moderate level of fitness for coastal walks. Worm's Head walk involves some uneven terrain.
